generated.out: Hundertwasser's Rainy Day is a short documentary film that tells the story of the renowned Austrian artist Friedensreich Hundertwasser during a rainy day in Venice. This film has been recognized with a nomination for the Academy Award for Best Documentary (Short Subject). The film is originally in German.
